publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1157 Phil Gallie: Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187)-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187).

S1M-1157 Phil Gallie: Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187)-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187).

S1M-1157 Phil Gallie: Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187)-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Prisons and Young Offenders Institutions (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2000 (SSI 2000/187).
